region.description:

new create/reject/pending, the obtained region values are empty

post.description: Use this API to upload files.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

file_data.description: Import the file in pdf and mp4 format. The file is a string generated by base64 encoding. If the file type is pdf, the original file size must not exceed 10M. If the file type is mp4, the original file size must not exceed 20M and the video aspect ratio is between 9:16 and 16:9.

post.description: Use this api to upload images when create a product

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

img_data.description:
Input image format file. The picture file is a string generated by base64 encoding.
Picture files,picture formats support JPG, JPEG, PNG, picture pixels at least 600 \* 600 and at most 20000 \* 20000, Max size of original image: 5MB

img_scene.description:
1:"PRODUCT_IMAGE" The ratio of horizontal and vertical is recommended to be 1:1
2:"DESCRIPTION_IMAGE"
3:"ATTRIBUTE_IMAGE " The ratio of horizontal and vertical is recommended to be 1:1
4:"CERTIFICATION_IMAGE"
5:"SIZE_CHART_IMAGE"

put.description: Use this api to edit products. This API is Full Sync.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

product_name.description:
It is recommended to avoid using Chinese because the copy will be displayed to local users
The character length must not exceed 188

description.description:
Brief rules:
Must conform to html syntax
Currently only supports

  • tags
    Tags cannot be nested
    You can only use the request parameters of the UploadImg API as the request parameters
    up to 9 images （please convert the img link via UploadImg API）.
    This field character limit needs to be within 10000 characters.
    It is recommended to avoid using Chinese because the copy will be displayed to local users.

brand_id.description: You can only choose from brands that already have qualifications, and you need to ensure that the qualifications are within the validity period

warranty_period.description:
Need to choose among the candidate values provided by the platform:
1:"4 weeks"
2:"2 months"
3:"3 months"
4:"4 months"
5:"5 months"
6:"6 months"
7:"7 months"
8:"8 months"
9:"9 months"
10:"10 months"
11:"11 months"
12:"12 months"
13:"2 years"
14:"3 years"
15:"1 week"
16:"2 weeks"
17:"18 months"
18:"4 years"
19:"5 years"
20:"10 years"
21:"lifetime warranty"

warranty_policy.description:
The character length needs to be within 99
It is recommended to avoid using Chinese because the copy will be displayed to local users

package_length.description:
The unit is cm
For cross-border products, length, width and height are required; For local-to-local products, either all length, width and height are not filled in or all are filled in

package_height.description:
The unit is cm
For cross-border products, length, width and height are required; For local-to-local products, either all length, width and height are not filled in or all are filled in

package_width.description:
The unit is cm
For cross-border products, length, width and height are required; For local-to-local products, either all length, width and height are not filled in or all are filled in

package_weight.description:
The unit is kilogram （maximum is 100kg）
Up to two digits after the decimal point

img_id.description: Only support the input of the sales attribute ID provided by the platform

id.description: You can only use the request parameters of the UploadImg API as the request parameters
You can only use the request parameters of the UploadFile API as the request parameters

is_cod_open.description: The category rule determines whether this parameter is required. If the category rule is "true", you can choose to turn on or off the cod, if the category rule is "false", you are not allowed to turn on the cod

id.description: Optional field. If you enter a parameter, you can edit the existing SKU; If no parameter is entered, SKU is added.

attribute_id.description:
Only support the input of the sales attribute ID provided by the platform
Enter up to three sales attributes

value_id.description:
The platform does not enter existing sales attribute values by default
If you need to keep the existing sales attribute value, you need to enter the sales attribute value id given by the platform before. If you do not need to keep the existing sales attribute values, you do not need to enter the id assigned by the platform
If you need to add a new sales attribute value, you do not need to enter value_id. After the custom_value request is submitted, the merchant will get the value_id assigned by

custom_value.description:
If you need to retain the existing sales attribute value, you need to enter the sales attribute value id assigned by the platform. Among the existing sales attribute values, the sales attribute value id assigned by the platform determines the sales attribute value
If you need to add a new sales attribute value, for the sales attribute value, you need to enter a custom sales attribute value, and there can be no duplicate sales attribute values under the same sales attribute
It is recommended to a

id.description:
You can only use the request parameters of the UploadImg API as the request parameters
At most, you can set a picture for one sales attribute. When only part of the sales attribute value is set with a picture, the system will use the product header image to fill in the sales attribute value without a picture

warehouse_id.description: This field is a required field (because some sellers will have multiple warehouses, sellers can get warehouse ID from API GetproductDetail. You must fill in the warehouse when you modify SKU).

available_stock.description:
The value should be non-negative numbers（include number 0）
The upper limit of the available stock value set at a time is 99999

seller_sku.description:
The character length must not exceed 50
It is recommended to avoid using Chinese because the copy will be displayed to local users

original_price.description: Indonesian rupiah, the minimum price is 100 ,and maximum price is 100 million.For Indonesia local to local business, please note that products with a discounted price of less than 2000 IDR may lead to a negative balance. For UK local business, the minimum price is 0.01GBP ,and maximum price is 5600 GBP For UK cross-border business, the minimum price is 0.01GBP ,and maximum price is 134.5 GBP Up to two digits after the decimal pointFor Thailand local buiness, the minimum price is 0.01TNB ,and maximum price is 260000TNB For Thailand crossborder buiness, the minimum price is 0.01THB ,and maximum price is 260000THBFor Malyasia local business(MYR), the minimum price is 0.01 MRY, and maximum price is 320000 MYRFor Vietnam local business, the minimum price is 1 VND and maximum price is 180000000 VNDFor Philippine local business，the minimum price is 0.01PHP and maximum price is 400000PHPFor Singapore local business，the minimum price is 0.01SGD and maximum price is 10000SGPFor Malyasia crossborder business(MYR), the minimum price is 0.01 MRY, and maximum price is 320000 MYRFor Vietnam crossborder business, the minimum price is 1 VND and maximum price is 1000000 VNDFor Philippine crossborder business，the minimum price is 0.01PHP and maximum price is 400000PHPFor Singapore crossborder business，the minimum price is 0.01SGD and maximum price is 400SGDUp to two digits after the decimal point.

identifier_code.description:
Identifier code logic：
1. Must be a numeric type
2. The number of characters needs to meet the requirements (GTIN: 14 digits, EAN: 8/13/14 digits, UPC: 12 digits, ISBN: 13 digits)
3. Different SKUs are not allowed to use the same gtin code.

identifier_code_type.description: Code type value: 1-GTIN、2-EAN、3-UPC、4-ISBN (input  one of them to this field)

outer_sku_id.description: This is the outer sku identifier

attribute_id.description: Only support the input of the product attribute ID that is provided by the platform（from GetAttribute API）

value_id.description: Only support the input of the product attribute value ID that is provided by the platform（from GetAttribute API）

value_name.description:
This field is for you fill in the custom attribute value . Here are some conditions of the field:
1. This field cannot fill in mandarin.
2. The maximum character is 35.
3. This field support submits multiple values , but these custom values cannot be duplicated.

package_dimension_unit.description:
This field is for America market(US) only(and this field is mandatory for US，optional for non-US region) . And it's invalid in other countries.
This field indicates the unit of the product package size information. It is an optional field and only supports single selection.
If you didn't fill in this field when you creating the product via API, the system will use the metric dimension unit for the product by default. If you select the dimension unit in this field, the system will save the product dimension information according to the unit that selected by this field.
Value: imperial, metric

video_id.description:
Here is the product video section . Please follow this step if you need to upload a video here:
1. please upload the video file via API[UploadFile]
2. Please get the response information (video id(file id)from API[UploadFile]) and fill the ID in this value.
3. this video id only support 1 id string.

put.description: Use this api to update product's stock.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

warehouse_id.description: if the SKU is using one default warehouse information ,then this warehouse id is optional field. if the SKU is using other warehouse or the SKU has multiple warehouse information ,then this warehouse id and stock information are mandatory when you update stock to certian wharehouse.

available_stock.description: The value should be non-negative numbers（include number 0）And less then 99999

post.description: Use this api to get product list.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

price_include_vat.description:
This price can only be obtained in cross-border business. This price is obtained after adding duty and other taxes based on the original price entered
This price will be displayed to the customer on the product details page.

create_time.description: The latest update time of the product. (unit is second)

update_time.description: The latest update time of the product. (unit is second)

create_time_from.description:
This is the product create time , and this is the time range condition filter . We suggest that you search the time range by "create_time_from" and "create_time_to".
If you only fill in the "create_time_to",and the "create_time_from" is empty ,then we will set the earliest time of the shop to the field "create_time_from" by default.
If you only fill in the "create_time_from",and the "create_time_to" is empty ,then we will set "now" to the field "create_time_to" by default.
This field is required. This data should be a 10-digits timestamp

create_time_to.description:
This is the product create time , and this is the time range condition filter . We suggest that you search the time range by "create_time_from" and "create_time_to".
If you only fill in the "create_time_to",and the "create_time_from" is empty ,then we will set the earliest time of the shop to the field "create_time_from" by default.
If you only fill in the "create_time_from",and the "create_time_to" is empty ,then we will set "now" to the field "create_time_to" by default.
This field is required. This data should be a 10-digits timestamp

update_time_from.description:
This is the product updated time , and this is the time range condition filter . We suggest that you search the time range by "update_time_from" and "update_time_to".
If you only fill in the "update_time_to",and the "update_time_from" is empty ,then we will set the earliest time of the shop to the field "update_time_from" by default.
If you only fill in the "update_time_from",and the "update_time_to" is empty ,then we will set "now" to the field "update_time_to" by default.
This field is require. This data should be a 10-digits timestamp

update_time_to.description:
This is the product updated time , and this is the time range condition filter . We suggest that you search the time range by "update_time_from" and "update_time_to".
If you only fill in the "update_time_to",and the "update_time_from" is empty ,then we will set the earliest time of the shop to the field "update_time_from" by default.
If you only fill in the "update_time_from",and the "update_time_to" is empty ,then we will set "now" to the field "update_time_to" by default.
This field is require. This data should be a 10-digits timestamp

page_size.description: Return up to 100 records per page

update_time.description: The time when the product was last updated(ms)

create_time.description: The time when the product was last updated(ms)

delivery_service_status.description:
This is the status of delivery service option, it means whether the delivery service is available on the current product, rather than the status of the delivery service itself.
ture=yes， false=no

post.description:
This API is for sellers to activate the deactive(off shelf) product (except the deleted product/frozen product /draft product).
When the seller activates the product via this API ,after API gets the information successfully , the product system side will send the product to audit team. (so product will pending for audit and waiting for the result).
Batch request API (20 per time)

For UK local business, the minimum price is 0.01GBP ,and maximum price is 5600 GBP For UK cross-border business, the minimum price is 0.01GBP ,and maximum price is 134.5 GBP Up to two digits after the decimal pointFor Thailand local buiness, the minimum price is 0.01TNB ,and maximum price is 260000TNB For Thailand crossborder buiness, the minimum price is 0.01THB ,and maximum price is 260000THBFor Malyasia local business(MYR), the minimum price is 0.01 MRY, and maximum price is 320000 MYRFor Vietnam local business, the minimum price is 1 VND and maximum price is 180000000 VNDFor Philippine local business，the minimum price is 0.01PHP and maximum price is 400000PHPFor Singapore local business，the minimum price is 0.01SGD and maximum price is 10000SGPFor Malyasia crossborder business(MYR), the minimum price is 0.01 MRY, and maximum price is 320000 MYRFor Vietnam crossborder business, the minimum price is 1 VND and maximum price is 1000000 VNDFor Philippine crossborder business，the minimum price is 0.01PHP and maximum price is 400000PHPFor Singapore crossborder business，the minimum price is 0.01SGD and maximum price is 400SGDUp to two digits after the decimal point.

get.description:
Use this api to get category list.
tips:
Commodity categories change frequently. It is recommended not to cache data locally. Please call the interface in real time to obtain the latest category data. Avoid category changes. When using the old category to create goods, the interface reports an error.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

local_display_name.description: The name of the category in the country where the shop operates

is_leaf.description: Whether the category is a leaf category

get.description: Use this api to get brand list.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

authorized_status.description:
This field returns whether the brands are authorized.
Value: Unauthorized = 1，Authorized = 2.

only_authorized.description: You can use the "only_authorized" field to decide whether to search only authorized brands.

brand_suggest.description: You can use the "brand_suggest" field to search for the brand name.

page_size.description:
"page_size" represents the return list pagination, the number of brands per page.
Integer between [1,200]. The "page_number" field and the "page_size" field should be used together. The product of the page_number field and the page_size field cannot exceed 10,000.

page_number.description:
"page number" represents the page number of the returned brand list.
Integer starting from 1. The "page_number" field and the "page_size" field should be used together. The product of the page_number field and the page_size field cannot exceed 10,000.

get.description: Use this api to get attribute information.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

name.description: Attributes name, different names in different operating countries

is_multiple_selected.description: Whether the attribute value supports multiple selection

is_customized.description: Whether the attribute value supports customization

category_id.description: Only support the input of leaf categories

get.description: Use this api to get the category rule.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

support_identifier_code_exemption.description: Only the UK market needs to fill in the GTIN code, UK sellers need to pay attention to whether the category allows GTIN exemption.

is_size_chart_mandatory.description:
This means whether the size chart information is mandatory in this category or not.
That the value is 'true' means that you must fill the sizechart information when you create product in this category .
That the value is ‘false’ means the sizechart is the optional information when you create product in this category.

category_id.description: Only support the input of leaf categories

post.description: get order detail by order id

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

payment_method.description:
The method for paying. Available value:
BANK_TRANSFER = 1;
CASH = 2;
DANA_WALLET = 3;
BANK_CARD = 4;
OVO = 5;
CASH_ON_DELIVERY = 6;
GO_PAY = 7;
PAYPAL = 8;
APPLEPAY = 9;
SHOPEEPAY = 10;
KLARNA = 11;
KLARNA_PAY_NOW = 12;
KLARNA_PAY_LATER = 13;
KLARNA_PAY_OVER_TIME = 14;
TRUE_MONEY = 15;
RABBIT_LINE_PAY = 16;
IBANKING = 17;
TOUCH_GO = 18;
BOOST = 19;
ZALO_PAY = 20;
MOMO = 21;
BLIK = 22;
PAYMAYA = 23;
GCASH = 24;
AKULAKU = 25;
GOOGLE_PAY = 26;
GRAB_PAY = 27;

delivery_option.description:
The method of delivery. Available value: STANDARD/ EXPRESS/ ECONOMY/ SEND_BY_SELLER .
Orders with STANDARD / EXPRESS / ECONOMY are platform logistics mode. Applicable region: cross-border & ID local
Orders with SEND_BY_SELLER are merchant self-shipping mode. Applicable region: UK local
STANDARD=1
EXPRESS=2
ECONOMY=3
SEND_BY_SELLER=4

shipping_provider.description: The name of the current shipping provider.

shipping_provider_id.description: The id of the current shipping provider.

region.description: For orders with masked region, please refer to the "region" field of GetAuthorizedShop. One shop_id has only one region.

seller_sku.description: Seller input sku in order snapshot

sku_ext_status.description:
The corresponding status of SKU for the scenario of buyer-request cancellation.
NONE_CANCELLATION = 0;
CANCEL_PENDING = 201;
CANCEL_REJECT = 202;
CANCEL_COMPLETED = 203;
This field will be used in future fulfillment apis.

sku_display_status.description:
- UNPAID = 100;
- TO_SHIP = 110;
- AWAITING_SHIPMENT = 111;
- AWAITING_COLLECTION = 112;
- IN_TRANSIT = 121;
- DELIVERED = 122;
- COMPLETED = 130;
- CALCELLED = 140;

cancel_user.description: The method of delivery. Avaliable value: SELLER/ BUYER/ SYSTEM .

ext_status.description:
Sub-status of order status. Developer can ignore 0 and 101-104.
201, 202, 203 are the corresponding status for the scenario of buyer-request cancellation. Buyer-request cancellation can only be triggered by buyers BEFORE the order is arranged shipment(order_status=112). Buyers can only request return/refund AFTER
Available value:
UN_DEFINED = 0;
RC_PROCESSING = 101; // Risk control in progress
RC_APPROVED = 102; // Risk control approved
RC_AUTO_APPROVED = 103; // Risk control expired with no

rts_time.description:
The time merchants shipped order(call ShipOrder successfully).
Unix timestamp.

rts_sla.description:
The latest shipping time specified by the platform.
Unix timestamp.

tts_sla.description:
The latest collection time specified by the platform.
Unix timestamp.

cancel_order_sla.description:
The automatic cancellation time for orders specified by the platform.
Unix timestamp.

update_time.description:
Time of order status changes.
Unix timestamp.

package_id.description:
Package ID.
This field will be used in future fulfillment apis.

split_or_combine_tag.description:
Indicate whether the order is combined or split.
"combined" ;
"split" ;
This field will be used in future fulfillment apis.

fulfillment_type.description:
Fulfillment type. Only orders with fulfillment type = 0 can be shipped by merchants.
FULFILLMENT_BY_MERCHANT = 0;
FULFILLMENT_BY_PLATFORM = 1;

post.description: Use this api to get the order list.

parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token

more.description: Whether has more orders in next page nor not

next_cursor.description: Cursor used for searching for more info.

total.description: Total amount of the search result

order_id.description: Unique id, same order id represent for the same order in the system

order_status.description:
Available value:
- UNPAID = 100;
- AWAITING_SHIPMENT = 111;
- AWAITING_COLLECTION = 112;
- PARTIALLY_SHIPPING = 114;
- IN_TRANSIT = 121;
- DELIVERED = 122;
- COMPLETED = 130;
- CANCELLED = 140;

Use this field to obtain orders in a specific status
- UNPAID = 100;
- AWAITING_SHIPMENT = 111;
- AWAITING_COLLECTION = 112;
- PARTIALLY_SHIPPING = 114;
- IN_TRANSIT = 121;
- DELIVERED = 122;
- COMPLETED = 130;
- CANCELLED = 140;

page_size.description: Use this field to specify the maximum number of orders to obtain in a single page. Must be 1-50.

cursor.description: - This field value would be returned in response data and you can use this to search the data on the next page. You do not need it at first search.

- FREEZE = 1; When the package is pending review for cancellation.

print_tag.description:
- None = 0
- only picking_list = 1
- only shipping_label = 4
- shipping label+picking_list= 5
PACK_LIST is not available in this version.

sku_tag.description:

- MANY = 2

pick_up_type.description:

- Pick_up = 1;
- Drop_off = 2;

cancel_because_logistic_issue.description:

package cancel not because logistic = 1

delivery_type.description:
For package which hasn't been deliveried, if delivery success, please input 1, if delivery failed, please input 2; For package which has been deliveried, if you want to update the attachment, please input 3.

1：DELIVER；
2：DELIVERY_FAILED；
3：UPDATE_POD；

reason.description:
delivery failed reason:
when deliver_type=2， this data is required, will be invalid when at the other type
103=it has an invalid shipping address
104=the customer was unavailable
105=the customer can't be reached
106=it was declined by the customer
100=of a shipping delay
116=package lost
117=package damage
110=a force majeure event occurred
148=something went wrong

post.description: use this api to retrieve all reverse order requests from buyers

reverse_order_id.description: The identification of a TikTok reverse order

order_id.description: The identification of a TikTok order

reverse_request_time.description: Time of reverse request. Unix timestamp.

reverse_update_time.description: Time of reverse update. Unix timestamp.

return_tracking_id.description: The return tracking ID when buyer returns the items.

more.description: Whether it has more orders on the next page or not

update_time_from.description: Unix timestamp. Reverse order updated time.

update_time_to.description: Unix timestamp. Reverse order updated time.

offset.description:
Use this field to specify the offset of the order. Must be greater than or equal to 0.
If "offset" is less than 0, then "offset" is assigned the default value of 0.

size.description:
Use this field to specify the maximum number of orders to obtain in a single page. Must be 1-100.
If "size" is less than 1, then "size" is assigned the default value of 10. If "size" is greater than 100, then "size" is assigned the default value of 100;

reverse_order_status.description: Available value: AFTERSALE_APPLYING = 1; AFTERSALE_REJECT_APPLICATION = 2;AFTERSALE_RETURNING = 3;AFTERSALE_BUYER_SHIPPED = 4; AFTERSALE_SELLER_REJECT_RECEIVE = 5;AFTERSALE_SUCCESS = 50; CANCEL_SUCCESS = 51;CLOSED = 99;COMPLETE = 100;

post.description: SearchSettlement: Using this API to search settlements within a certain timeframe

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

next_cursor.description: Cursor used for searching for more information

more.description: Whether there are more orders on the next page or not

order_id.description: Order ID: one of Order ID and Adjustment ID must not be 0

adjustment_id.description: Adjustment ID: one of Order ID and Adjustment ID must not be 0

related_order_id.description:
If the Order ID is not null, related_order_id is the order ID itself
If the Adjustment ID is not null and the adjustment is based on a specific order, related_order_id is the order ID corresponding to that adjustment; if the Adjustment ID is not null and the adjustment is based on shop level, related_order_id will be null.

sku_id.description: Sku ID. Indonesia orders don't have this value yet.

sku_name.description: Sku Name. Indonesia orders don't have this value yet.

product_name.description: Product Name. Indonesia orders don't have this value yet.

settlement_time.description: The time TTS pays out the money. Not necessarily the time merchants receive the money.

platform_promotion.description: Promotion expenses subsidized by the platform, which may include coupons and other promotional events organized by the platform

shipping_fee_subsidy.description: A positive amount represents the shipping fee discount received for participating in a platform campaign, and a negative amount represents a shipping fee discount you need to return.

payment_fee.description: The technical service fee charged on the platform's online payment, refund, settlement and other categories (X% of settlement amount)

platform_commission.description: The platform commission fee charged by the platform (X% of settled orders)

flat_fee.description: The flat fee is a fixed amount charged per valid order

sales_fee.description: The sales fee is a percentage of the product price after the seller discount, charged to the seller

affiliate_commission.description: The commission fee one needs to pay to a creator when s/he promotes a product on Tiktok platform and generates orders (the amount depends on the seller's promotion plan)

vat.description: VAT paid by platform on one's Behalf. Only applicable for cross-border shop orders. All the other fields' amount in this API is vat excluded.

shipping_fee.description: The shipping fee paid by the merchant when the merchant selects logistics services supported by TikTok Shop

small_order_fee.description: The small order fee is a service fee paid by the customer on small value orders.

seller_reason_fund_deduction.description: Due to seller's liability, which brings unpleasant experience for buyers, then seller will bear the cost of buyer's loss.

shipping_fee_adjustment.description:
Adjustment fee charged to compensate for the difference in the amount between the actual shipping fee and the pre-paid shipping fee.
Positive value: TTS pays the merchants;
Negative value: TTS charges the merchants.

charge_back.description:
The returned amount to the payment card after a customer successfully disputes an item on his/her account statement or transactions report.
Positive value: TTS pays the merchants;
Negative value: TTS charges the merchants.

customer_service_compensation.description:
The refund amount after an order is paid or over-refunded.
Positive value: TTS pays the merchants;
Negative value: TTS charges the merchants.

promotion_adjustment.description:
Positive value: TTS pays the merchants;
Negative value: TTS charges the merchants.

other_adjustment.description:
Positive value: TTS pays the merchants;
Negative value: TTS charges the merchants.

delete.description: Use this api to delete global product. When the global product is deleted ,then all the local products which are under the global product will be deleted at the same time (either published product or others). And all the deleted global product is not allowed active again until now ,related local product either. Please pay attention before you delete the global product.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

post.description: Use this API to get the global product list for seller

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

update_time_from.description:
1、The most recently updated time of the product, here is a product data time range filtering items (from the time of update_time_from to the time of update_time_to);
2、If the seller only enters update_time_from, the TT default time of update_time_to is the current time (i.e. the latest time).
3、If the seller only enters update_time_to, the TT default update_time_from time defaults to the seller's opening time.
4、we recommend that sellers are best to use a combination of two fields update_time_from and update_time_to to accurately query the product list.
5、UTC time must be used.

update_time_to.description:
1、The most recently updated time of the product, here is a product data time range filtering items (from the time of update_time_from to the time of update_time_to);.
2、If the seller only enters update_time_from, the TT default time of update_time_to is the current time (i.e. the latest time).
3、If the seller only enters update_time_to, the TT default update_time_from time defaults to the seller's opening time.
4、we recommend that sellers are best to use a combination of two fields update_time_from and update_time_to to accurately query the product list.
5、UTC time must be used.

create_time_from.description:
The creation time of the product, which is a time range filter for the product data (from the time of create_time_from to the time of create_time_to).
If the seller only enters create_time_from, then TT defaults the time of create_time_to to the current time (i.e. the latest time).
If the seller only enters create_time_to, the TT default time of create_time_from defaults to the time the seller opened the store.
We recommend that sellers better use a combination of two fields create_time_from and create_time_to to accurately query the product list.
5、UTC time must be used.

create_time_to.description:
The creation time of the product, which is a time range filter for the product data (from the time of create_time_from to the time of create_time_to).
If the seller only enters create_time_from, then TT defaults the time of create_time_to to the current time (i.e. the latest time).
If the seller only enters create_time_to, the TT default time of create_time_from defaults to the time the seller opened the store.
We recommend that sellers better use a combination of two fields create_time_from and create_time_to to accurately query the product list.
5、UTC time must be used.

post.description: Use this API to publish global product to the local shop

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

shop_region.description: 目标发布店铺所属区域( "GB","ID", "TH","MY","PH")

local_product_publish_result.description:
local商品发布结果
0：成功
1：存草稿
2：失败

local_product_id.description:
local商品发布结果
0：成功
1：存草稿
2：失败

local_sku_id.description: 发布到local所生成的local SKU id

attribute_id.description: local SKU id对应的销售属性ID

value_id.description: local SKU id对应的销售属性值ID

original_price.description:
1.非必填
2.商家可以根据具体情况自行写入该Global SKU 发布在local店铺中的SKU原价。
3.如果商家未填写SKU原价，则系统默认按照公式进行换算（此处逻辑和fans商品管理端的价格换算一致：local price=global price*VAT税率*市场汇率+预估运费）
4.各个区域的币种：
GB：英镑
ID：印尼盾
TH：泰铢
MY：马来西亚令吉
PH：菲律宾比索

warehouse_id.description:
仓库ID
如果未填写，默认填入默认仓库

available_stock.description:
1.商家可以根据具体情况自行写入该Global SKU 发布在local店铺中的SKU的库存量。
2.库存量不做加总校验，即，如果local商品库存大于Global库存，则直接更新global库存=所有local库存和即可。

put.description: Use this API to edit global product price

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

original_price.description:
货币为美元，小数点后最多2位
-当global商品未发布状态下，价格更新将会只更新global价格。
-当global商品已发布至local的状态下，当商家选择调用该接口更新global价格的话，系统直接更新global价格并自动计算并更新local价格（计算公式为系统的默认算价公式）

get.description:
tips:
Commodity categories change frequently. It is recommended not to cache data locally. Please call the API in real time to obtain the latest category data. Avoid category changes. When using the old category to create goods, the API will return an error

parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The authorization token for verifying the permissions

is_mandatory.description:
是否必填，返回是或者否
指商品创建、编辑接口的sale_attributes里边是否必填这个属性

is_customized.description: 属性值是否支持自定义输入

id.description: 属性值ID(平台提供的属性值)

get.description: Use this api to get the global category rule.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generate by the gen algorithm

name.description: The name of the product qualification (that is, the product qualification type, such as SNI, BPOM, etc.)

is_mandatory.description:
This field indicates whether the qualification field of the global product under this category is mandatory.
The generation logic of whether the product qualification is mandatory:
If it is mandatory in all available countries/regions of the seller, the qualification is mandatory when the seller publishes global products;
If it is not mandatory in one or more of the countries/regions available to the seller, the qualification is not mandatory when the seller publishes global products.

support_size_chart.description: This field indicates that global products support the size chart if the size chart is supported in one or more of the seller's available regions.

is_size_chart_mandatory.description: This field indicates whether the size chart is mandatory when creating a global product, true means mandatory, and false means not mandatory.
